channel.title: Comments on: Satellite Party guitarist writing songs with Steve Perry?

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description: dude, i thought we said no more journey psyche-outs?
item.content:encoded: dude, i thought we said no more journey psyche-outs?

item.title: By: Ton yTaylor
item.dc:creator: Ton yTaylor
item.description: Why is this so inplausibl? Perry is an amazing vocalist and if you could look beyond what Rolling Stone ingrained you so well to think about Extreme. Nuno was and IS a motherfucker on guitar. Just like Steve's Journey guitarist Neal Schon.
item.content:encoded: Why is this so inplausibl? Perry is an amazing vocalist and if you could look beyond what Rolling Stone ingrained you so well to think about Extreme. Nuno was and IS a motherfucker on guitar. Just like Steve’s Journey guitarist Neal Schon.
